## General

**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  EBANX is a global financial group with Brazilian DNA. We offer an end-to-end payment solution across the entire ecommerce transaction flow, without the need for a local entity. Our mission is to provide solid bridges between global merchants and LatAm's multicultural population. We truly believe people should have the power to choose and go further, and thatâ€™s why we offer local payment methods on the biggest websites worldwide. We dream big, so join us on our journey.
